1.0.name: wordpress/facebook-open-graph-meta-for-wordpress
1.0.description:
Add Facebook Open Graph protocol to turn your web pages into graph objects and enables you to integrate your Web pages into the social graph.

See my article for details and video tutorial Facebook Open Graph Meta For WordPress for details.
